title: Find book by title, authorID, or ISBN. Gets found book
name: FindBooks

Links for webpages that store the book.
Read, Currently Reading, or Want to Read.

Parameter.description: Limit reviews to a particular rating or above,(default is 0).

Success 200.description: The text for the review entered by user.
Date where review was entered by user.

examples.content:

{
     "ReviewId":"5c9243a5beb4101160e23fdd",

}

Parameter.description: Name of user who wrote the comment
Id of user who wrote the comment
the date the comment was written on

the id of the user who wrote each comment

Parameter.description: Id of review given as type Parameter
Id of the resource being liked( the comment or the review)
Name of user who wrote the review
Id of user who wrote the review
the date the review was written on
shelf name in which review is in

Parameter.description: Id of the review to be deleted

Error 4xx.description: the review you are looking for does not exist

title: Gets information about a book's read Status
name: GetUserReadStatus

Parameter.description: The Book Id To Get Status for.

Success 200.description: Gives the User the Book Ids of His Read.
Gives the User the Book Ids of His Want to Read.
Gives the User the Book Ids of His Currently Reading.
if the delete happend successfully or not
User id the user who is to see the status
the date when the status was written
comment id if the type is comment (optional)
review Id alawys exisit weather the type is comment or review
the id of the user who made the status

examples.title: Expected Data on Success
examples.content:
{

type : Review
StatusId : "82978363763"
MakerId : "shjfhghdsg"
UserId : "82sdfd8363763"
ReviewId : "82gf8363763"

},
{

type : Comment
CommentId : "hisadsfjhdld"
StatusId : "82978363763"
MakerId : "shjfhghdsg"
UserId : "82sdfd8363763"
ReviewId : "82gf8363763"
.......
},.....

Success 200.description: if the update happend successfully or not
